name: BIT.TRIP BEAT
overview: Everything comes from something. We were before we became. From life comes rhythm, and from rhythm comes life. We are beings of information. Everything is a conduit for learning. We communicate in bits and bytes. And we will return to something once we become nothing. After our BIT.TRIP is complete Features: * Classic Arcade-Style Gameplay * Retro-Inspired Art Style * Music/Rhthym-Based Gameplay * 8-bit and Chiptune Music * 4-Player Local Co-op Multiplayer
